Actions.Name: Beserkgang
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or gain hatred of the Jotunn. On a successful save, they are dazed.

Actions.Name: Joyous Combat
Actions.Description: All adjacent foes must choose: be shoved 2, or take [D] damage from the Jotunn.

Actions.Name: Strength of the Storm
Actions.Description: The Jotunn gains sturdy and counter but becomes immobile. The Jotunn and all its adjacent allies also gain resistance. This stance ends at the end of the Jotunn's next turn.

Actions.Name: Hurl
Actions.Description: The Jotunn picks up an adjacent character or summon and shoves them 3.
